fields.comment: If set, target position x is in world coordinates, otherwise it's an offset
fields.name: target_x_is_absolute_position

fields.comment: If set, target position y is in world coordinates, otherwise it's an offset
fields.name: target_y_is_absolute_position

fields.comment: This entity is loaded at the source position when teleportation occurs
fields.name: source_particle_fx_file

fields.comment: This entity is loaded at the target position when teleportation occurs
fields.name: target_particle_fx_file

fields.comment: if we don't want things to collapse after the teleport
fields.name: load_collapse_entity

fields.comment: used to keep track that we're not stuck in waiting for a pixel scene to load, that is not going to be loaded
fields.name: safety_counter
